flawed_nl_solution:
Each week, David will spend 3 hours + 3 hours + 4 hours = <<3+3+4=10>>10 hours in class.
Add to that his 4 hours of small group work, 4 + 10 = <<4+10=19>>19 hours a week.
He will spend 19 hours x 24 weeks = <<19*24=456>>456 hours on the course.
#### 456

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 14, not 19. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
